remarks: Projective subspace sum operation value for nonempty sets.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
paddfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddfval.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddvaln0N $p |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ X C_ A /\ Y C_ A ) /\ ( X =/= (/) /\ Y =/= (/) ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = { p e. A | E. q e. X E. r e. Y p .<_ ( q .\/ r ) } ) $.
$d .<_ p q r $.
$d .\/ p q r $.
$d A p q r $.
$d K p q r $.
$d X p q r $.
$d Y p q r $.
$d p q r $.
